lead_paragraph: Detroit Lions receiver Calvin Johnson, one of the most prolific wideouts in the game, said on Wednesday he is mulling an early retirement from the National Football League after nine seasons.

headline.print_headline: Lions Star Receiver Calvin Johnson Considers Retirement
headline.main: Lions Star Receiver Calvin Johnson Considers Retirement

snippet: Detroit Lions receiver Calvin Johnson, one of the most prolific wideouts in the game, said on Wednesday he is mulling an early retirement from the National Football League after nine seasons....
